verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> is our refuge <S%H4268><s%> and strength, <S%H5797><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> present <S%H4672><s%> help <S%H5833><s%> in trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

Therefore we won't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, though the earth <S%H776><s%> changes, <S%H4171><s%> though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are shaken <S%H4131><s%> into the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas; <S%H3220><s%>
though its waters <S%H4325><s%> roar <S%H1993><s%> and are troubled, <S%H2560><s%> though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> tremble <S%H7493><s%> with their swelling. <S%H1346><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

There is a river, <S%H5104><s%> the streams <S%H6388><s%> of which make the city <S%H5892><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> glad, <S%H8055><s%> the holy <S%H6918><s%> place of the tents <S%H4908><s%> of the Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is in her midst. <S%H7130><s%> She shall not be moved. <S%H4131><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> her at <S%H6437><s%> dawn. <S%H1242><s%>
The nations <S%H1471><s%> raged. <S%H1993><s%> The kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> were moved. <S%H4131><s%> He lifted <S%H5414><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> melted. <S%H4127><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is with us. <S%H430><s%> The God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge. <S%H4869><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Come, <S%H3212><s%> see <S%H2372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s works, <S%H4659><s%> what desolations <S%H8047><s%> he has made <S%H7760><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He makes wars <S%H4421><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> He breaks <S%H7665><s%> the bow, <S%H7198><s%> and shatters <S%H7112><s%> the spear. <S%H2595><s%> <S%H7112><s%> He burns <S%H8313><s%> the chariots <S%H5699><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

"Be still, <S%H7503><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> that I am God. <S%H430><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is with us. <S%H430><s%> The God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge. <S%H4869><s%> Selah.
